statement_date.description: The date the statement was issued

deal_number.description: It is in POINT NBR column and in format '40555 - FRANCEY1' where 40555 is the deal number

gas_day.description: Gas day is the date of the transaction, it is mentioned as date range in TRAN DATES column

buy_sell.description: Buy or sell, can be detected in the subheader as Purchase from KOCH ENERGY SERVICES or Sale to KOCH ENERGY SERVICES

volume.description: Volume of the transaction mentioned in 'QUANTITY MMBTU' column

amount.description: Amount of the transaction mentioned in 'INVOICE' column

location.description: Transaction hub or pool location, it is in NAME column

invoice_total.description: Total of the invoice, followed by 'Total Due to KINDER MORGAN TEJAS PIPELINE LLC/(KOCH ENERGY SERVICES, LLC)'

tax_amount.description: Tax of the invoice, followed by 'Tax Total'
